availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Patrick Burke (Louisville, Kentucky, saddler and harness maker)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, saddler and harness maker. Native of Ireland. Married to Maria Gallagher Burke. Father of Richard Burke, Mary A. Burke, Andrew Burke, Catherine Burke, Margaret Burke, and Patrick Burke. Saddler in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1i860. Saddler in partnership with John P. McGrath in Louisville in 1861. Saddle and harness maker in partnership with John Gallagher in Louisville in 1865.
